column4: Hello, Brasero is giving me SCSI errors when I try to burn, well, anything, I tried K3B, and K3B gives me a notice that Wodim was unable to fixate the disk after an error which I can fix by setting permissions. is there anything I can try?
Is your user in the cdrom and plugdev groups?
and as I said, brasero gives me some sort of SCSI error
I tried K3B with the burning group, no luck.
I ran the ISO through cdrecord, and this is the output I got: http://pastebin.com/PN8ZzyHN
It's saying "medium error" there... Is the cd/dvd/etc you have inserted compatible with the DVD+RW format you have selected to burn in?
the disk is a DVD-RW if that's what you mean.
might as well try a fresh disk.
I tried a fresh disc, same output. so I can only assume it is my drive. >.< I don't have the money to replace it.
It seems possible that the laser which reads the media is going/kaput
and I have no money to get it repaired.
funny thing is is that it reads just fine.
What is the result of: wodim -scanbus -vV
